channel.title: GenerationX | Spawn | Active Pking | Target system | PK skill | Random Drops | v
channel.description:
Welcome to GenerationX Spawn!
Play now webclient http://generationx-pk.net/play.php
Download desktop client http://generationx-pk.net/desktopgx.zip
Highscores http://generationx-pk.net/highscores.php
Forums (vBulletin) very active http://generationx-pk.net/vb
Homepage http://generationx-pk.net/
You might wonder, why would you play GenerationX if there are more than 1000 servers out there?
- Well there are several answers for that question.
We are trying to be unique from other spawn servers, and I believe we're doing it pretty right. We're working on a new feature called 'Bounty Time' which is going to be awesome, no one server ever had that feature on their server.
We offer a amazing player support, bounty target system fully working, random rare drops for your kills, and even fight monsters to get rare items!
Great PK skill system, Kill players & get XP, Get more levels to wear strong weapons!
We've got a active vBulletin forum community, with more than 60 players active daily!
Features > Stable combat > PK skill (Level up by killing people). > Bounty Target System > Random Rare Drops > PvM for rare drops > More than 5 bosses to fight with. > Multiple Pking spots > Active Pking community > Vote4rewards auth system > Automatic donation system > Dedicated VPS hosted with DDoS protection > Lagfree & Bugfree pking. > Active vBulletin community. > Daily / Weekly updates > Professional developers. > Not just another kill for PKP server. > PK points shop. > Vote points shop > Target points shop > Working highscores with PK kills, deaths, ratio, PK levels.
MEDIA
[img]http://gyazo.com/5a486c7ccf09defe08e0e93c83222e03.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/bb2c3a3ac994128795ad529f4e9a3755.png[/img]
We're waiting for you!

You might wonder, why would you play GenerationX if there are more than 1000 servers out there?

  • Well there are several answers for that question.

We are trying to be unique from other spawn servers, and I believe we’re doing it pretty right.
We’re working on a new feature called ‘Bounty Time’ which is going to be awesome, no one server ever had that feature on their server.

We offer a amazing player support, bounty target system fully working, random rare drops for your kills, and even fight monsters to get rare items!

Great PK skill system, Kill players & get XP, Get more levels to wear strong weapons!

We’ve got a active vBulletin forum community, with more than 60 players active daily!

Features

Stable combat
PK skill (Level up by killing people).
Bounty Target System
Random Rare Drops
PvM for rare drops
More than 5 bosses to fight with.
Multiple Pking spots
Active Pking community
Vote4rewards auth system
Automatic donation system
Dedicated VPS hosted with DDoS protection
Lagfree & Bugfree pking.
Active vBulletin community.
Daily / Weekly updates
Professional developers.
Not just another kill for PKP server.
PK points shop.
Vote points shop
Target points shop
Working highscores with PK kills, deaths, ratio, PK levels.

MEDIA

We’re waiting for you!
